permissions: User must be able to update the identified record (authorization is delegated to the identifies policy).
side_effects: Updates the external identification and touches the identified record after commit when value changes.
validation_notes: At least one attribute must be provided (value and or skip-value-validation). external_identification_type must be applicable to the identifies class. If value is set and the type has a format_validation_regex, value must match it unless skip-value-validation is set. If value is set and the type requires global uniqueness, value must be unique unless skip-value-validation is set. skip-value-validation must be true or false. Changes are rejected when the feature flag deny_user_changes_to_external_identifications_<identifies_type> is enabled for the current user.

flags.name: --skip-value-validation
flags.validation: When true, skips format and global uniqueness checks.
